name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter: Ultimate Challenge
overview: Hunting Season has finally arrived! Get ready for the most realistic hunting action ever to come to your living room. If you like incredibly life-like graphics, animal intelligence that will make you stop in your tracks and trophy game you only dream about... You'll LOVE Cabela's Big Game Hunter. - Hunt in 8 different locations. Alberta, Alaska, Montana, Missouri, Newfoundland, Colorado, Texas, and Nebraska - Hunt over 12 game animals - More than a dozen non-games animals populate the different regions - X-Ray Mode allows players to see the internal organs of their prey so that they can line up the perfect shot. - Trophy Room which displays the user's game and tier statistics - 15 Firearms and 3 Bows, plus over 3 dozen other pieces of hunting equipment to choose from Players: 1 Memory Card: 1 Block Analog Control Compatible Vibration Function Compatible
